# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This item is worth more than $150 to me, but I believe in making it accessible to those who appreciate its unique features. For you, I am offering this product at an exclusive price of $199. It comes with a satisfaction guarantee and a limited-time warranty. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the excellence firsthand. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this investment in yourself. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $199. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $199
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
